kiwi.ui
Class ImagePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              kiwi.ui.ImagePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JComponent

A component for displaying an icon image. The component's preferred and minimum sizes are equal to the size of the image.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Softare Group
See Also:
Serialized Form
